io.github.hhromic.uimr.stats

Class CountingMatrix<K1,K2>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.hhromic.uimr.stats.CountingMatrix<K1,K2>

  • public class CountingMatrix<K1,K2>
extends Object
    Generic Counting Matrix class.

    This class implements a counting sparse matrix with generic key types. The internal counts are backed by long numbers.

    Since:
    4.0
    Author:
    Hugo Hromic

        Gets all the keys stored for the first dimension.

        the keys of the first dimension

      • getKeys

        public Set<K2> getKeys(K1 k1)
        Gets all the keys stored for the second dimension for a particular first dimension key.
        Parameters:
        k1 - the key for the first dimension
        Returns:
        the keys of the second dimension, null if the key is not found

      • getCount

        public long getCount(K1 k1,
                     K2 k2)
        Gets the count of a particular (k1,k2) key pair.
        Parameters:
        k1 - the key for the first dimension
        k2 - the key for the second dimension
        Returns:
        the count of the key pair, zero if the (k1,k2) pair is not found

      • increment

        public void increment(K1 k1,
                      K2 k2,
                      long amount)
        Increments the count for a particular (k1,k2) key pair.

        If there is no count yet, it is initialised to 0.

        Parameters:
        k1 - the key for the first dimension
        k2 - the key for the second dimension
        amount - the amount to increment the count

      • getTotalCount

        public long getTotalCount(K1 k1)
        Gets the total count for a particular first dimension key.
        Parameters:
        k1 - the key for the first dimension
        Returns:
        the total count for the first dimension key, zero if the key is not found
